resources.string: This Android application is a companion app for \"Transport Monitoring System for School Kids Safety\", TMSSKS for short. It aims to provide monitoring mechanism for registered kids in the system so whenever they entered or left a bus or a school. Also it shows a quickly-accessed timeline lists the time of kids records. TMSSKS app is for Parents only.

This application is one of the outcomes of the graduation project title "Transport Monitoring System for School Kids Safety". Sponsored by College of Computer Sciences and Information Technology, King Faisal University.

Done by:
Abdulrahman Mohammed Al'omar
Ammar Abdullah Al'abdulqader
Khalid Ali Alshehri

Supervised by:
Dr. Shakeel Ahmed

Committee Members:
Dr. Mohammed Billal
Dr. Sayd Afaq Husain

(Spring 2017)
